Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46136 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-46136 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-werkzeug is earlier than 3.0.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-46136
